arcLabelRadius.description: The radius between circle center and the arc label in px.

cornerRadius.description: The radius applied to arc corners (similar to border radius).

faded.description: Override the arc attibutes when it is faded.

highlighted.description: Override the arc attibutes when it is highlighted.

innerRadius.description: The radius between circle center and the begining of the arc.

onClick.description: Callback fired when a pie item is clicked.

typeDescriptions.event: The event source of the callback.

outerRadius.description: The radius between circle center and the end of the arc.

paddingAngle.description: The padding angle (deg) between two arcs.

slotProps.description: The props used for each component slot.
